hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #4# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: @ tries to read the Gossip Stone...^${12 48 06}but he's standing on the wrong side of it!

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Strength Upgrade#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

SFM (Saria).text: Fell for it, didn't you, fool? Junk hint cross split attack!

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #3# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
